title: Narrative Common UI
description: Incredible Multi-platform UI for Every Narrative Tool - Install this if you want to use the UI that comes with any the Narrative tools.
longDescription:
Learn more at our website, narrativetools.io:

WEBSITE


GET STARTED WITH NARRATIVE COMMONUI:

QUICK START VIDEO GUIDE (Recommended)

WRITTEN DOCUMENTATION

DISCORD SUPPORT CHANNEL


TRY NARRATIVE BEFORE YOU BUY:

NARRATIVE PLAYABLE DEMO



WHAT IS NARRATIVE COMMONUI?

If you plan on using any of the UI that comes with a Narrative product, like the Inventory Menu from the Narrative Inventory plugin, you'll need to install Narrative Common UI first - don't worry, its quick and free to set up.


Q: Why do I have to install a separate plugin just to use my Narrative products UI? That seems annoying!

A: It allows us to do some amazing stuff we couldn't otherwise:

  •  Use any gamepad you like with your Narrative tools - we've built the plugin with CommonUI which beautifully handles any platform you like - Mouse & Keyboard, Xbox, PS5, & Switch, and more.
  •  Change the styling of every single Narrative UI in your game by changing a single asset instead of spending hours manually changing them all individually
  •  Keeps your packaged game size smaller since all fonts and icons are stored in 1 plugin rather than having a bunch of duplicates for each Narrative tool you're using


Thank you to Julio Cacko, who has created the Free Input Prompts Pack and released it under the CC0 license. You can find Julio Cackos studio, Catlabel Game Studio here.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Use any gamepad you like with your Narrative tools - we've built the plugin with CommonUI which beautifully handles any platform you like - Mouse & Keyboard, Xbox, PS5, & Switch, and more.
  •  Change the styling of every single Narrative UI in your game by changing a single asset instead of spending hours manually changing them all individually
  •  Keeps your packaged game size smaller since all fonts and icons are stored in 1 plugin rather than having a bunch of duplicates for each Narrative tool you're using

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  •  NarrativeCommonUI (Runtime)
  •  NarrativeCommonUIEditor (Editor)

Number of Blueprints: 26

Number of C++ Classes: 4

Network Replicated: Yes, all Narrative Products support networked play

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, however other platforms can be easily built for, please inquire in our discord

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, however other platforms can be easily built for, please inquire in our discord

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/13lofD4cZqTpeGOM5x4HSKHWRx7ptJbav4FEnCMBbzQU/edit?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes: All Narrative Plugins are sold separately
